name: Operation: Escape
description:
AD/arrow keys: Move

Space: Jump

E: interact

S: Dash (unlockable)

Well you're in a pickle. Somehow you ended up in prison, and now you just have to make your way out. The only problem: everyone else wants to stop you.

  • Small, thoughtful puzzle platformer.
  • Retro 8-bit world with bright colours and simple, satisfying gameplay.
  • 4 full levels complete with extra challenges and objectives
